info.title: Sage Wallet RPC API
info.description:
RPC API for Sage wallet. All endpoints accept JSON request bodies and return JSON responses.

**Authentication**: Sage RPC uses Mutual TLS for authentication.

post.description: Add a new URI to an NFT's metadata (for updated content or mirrors).

requestBody.description: Request parameters for the add_nft_uri endpoint

400.description: Bad request - invalid parameters or malformed JSON

401.description: Unauthorized - no wallet is currently logged in, or authentication is required

404.description: Not found - requested resource doesn't exist (e.g., NFT, offer, transaction)

500.description: Internal server error - unexpected failure in wallet operations

post.description: Add a new peer to connect to by host and port.

requestBody.description: Request parameters for the add_peer endpoint

400.description: Bad request - invalid parameters or malformed JSON

401.description: Unauthorized - no wallet is currently logged in, or authentication is required

404.description: Not found - requested resource doesn't exist (e.g., NFT, offer, transaction)

500.description: Internal server error - unexpected failure in wallet operations
